text: Hi @Channels. How do i can connect the particular ticket with contact and contact to ticket using an api

I am getting this email response from the <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/cms_email/get-the-details-for-a-marketing-email?_ga=2.144827444.1409373819.1679659646-923022038.1679659646|marketing email API>, any idea why the absolute URL is not working?


{
  "ab": false,
  "abHoursToWait": 4,
  "abSampleSizeDefault": null,
  "abSamplingDefault": null,
  "abSuccessMetric": null,
  "abTestPercentage": 50,
  "abVariation": false,
  "absoluteUrl": "<http://6203240.hs-sites.com/-temporary-slug-5a6177ee-a86e-4255-8785-2e7cc7d92491>",
  "allEmailCampaignIds": [
    249621678
  ],
  ..
}
shows 404 for both the url and absolute url

<@U012PBG90SZ> the absoluteURL and URL are only used for the web version of the email.

So, if the email doesn’t have that enabled, those links won’t work.

If you want to link directly to the email in the portal, build this link:

```<https://app.HubSpot.com/email/{{portalID}}/details/{{ID}}/performance>```
You can also look at the field `createPage` to see if a web version has been enabled.
Hey Justin thank you so much for helping me out, is this documented somewhere?
Hi! Has anyone connected MixPanel to HubSpot? I have a project that needs to receive events from MixPanel into HubSpot.
